info.title: Return as a Service with ShopRunBack

get.description: This endpoint is available to anyone with a valid token

put.description: This endpoint is accessible by anyone with a valid token

get.description: This endpoint might be called on his own id or the one of a teammate

post.summary: Create an anonymous user associated with a shipback
post.description:
This endpoints allows to create an anonymous user associated with a
shibpack. It allows customers to perform some API calls on the
associated shipback and quotes during the return registration process.

shipback_id.description: UUID of the shipback the user is created for

400.description: There was an error processing the request

auth_token.description:
An autentication token that can be used to perform some
API calls on the associated shipback

get.description: Company owner and company collaborators can access this endpoint

put.description: Only company owners can call this endpoint

403.description: Forbidden. You doesn't have sufficient  privileges to call this endpoint.

get.summary: List the companies the calling user has access to
get.description: List all the companies the current_user is an  employee of. Company owners might have access to more informations.

403.description: You do not have access to this endpoint

get.description: Only the owner and team members of the company can access this endpoint.
Company owner and company collaborator can access this endpoint

post.summary: Invite a collaborator to your team (Manager only)

get.description: List all countries your customer can return a product from

post.summary: Add a list of countries (Manager only)
post.description: Sets the list of countries for which you want to enable the ShopRunBack return service. It is **recommended** to use the dashboard instead of the API.

get.description: List all countries supported by ShopRunBack
List all reasons your customer can use to return a product

200.description: Company's reason codes if company known.

post.summary: Add a list of reasons (Manager only)
post.description: Add a list of reasons you want to add for your customers. It is **recommended** to use the dashboard instead of the API.

get.summary: List all reasons supported by ShopRunBack
get.description: List all reasons supported by ShopRunBack
List all wishes your customer can use to return a product

200.description: Company's wishes codes if company known.

post.summary: Sets the list of wishes supported by the company (Manager only)
post.description:
Add a list of wishes you want to add for your customers.
It is recommended to use the dashboard instead of the API.

get.summary: List all wishes supported by ShopRunBack
get.description: List all wishes supported by ShopRunBack

post.description:
You can create a rule for a specific country and reason but if you do not provide the country and/or the reason you will create several rules for all your countries and/or all your reasons.
It is easier to manage your relocation rules on the dashboard: https://dashboard.shoprunback.com/relocations.

Only the owner or a manager can create a sponsoring.

You can create a sponsoring for a specific country and reason but if you do not provide the country and/or the reason you will create several sponsorings for all your countries and/or all your reasons.
It is easier to manage your sponsoring on the dashboard: https://dashboard.shoprunback.com/sponsorings.

Only the owner or a manager can create a sponsoring.

Add a warehouse to your company.
It is recommended to use the dashboard instead of the API.
Warning: a warehouse can't be deleted by yourself because logistics operation could be already triggered (Contact the support to really delete a warehouse).

400.description: There were errors creating the warehouse

parameters.name: identifier
parameters.description: The warehouse UUID or the warehouse reference (set on create)

404.description: The warehouse does not exist or you are not allowed to access it

get.summary: Get all jig sizes supported by ShopRunBack

get.description: If you don't have created any brand, only the default one (created for you) will be returned.

post.description: If your catalog as multiple brands and you manage your products per brand, you can create the brands on ShopRunBack. Otherwise, you don't have to create any brand, a default brand will be used.

400.description: There were errors while creating your brand

parameters.name: identifier
parameters.description: The brand UUID or the brand reference

parameters.name: identifier
parameters.description: The brand UUID or the brand reference

400.description: There were errors while updating your brand

delete.description: The brand should not have any linked products

parameters.name: identifier
parameters.description: The brand UUID or the brand reference

403.description: This operation is not allowed. The brand might not owned by your company (wrong id), you might be trying to remove the default brand or a brand which still has some associated products

400.description: There were errors deleting the brand

post.description: Please note that the image processing might happen asynchronously, so the picture_url returned by this call might still contain the default picture

201.description: The created product with its brand

400.description: There were errors processing your request

parameters.name: identifier
parameters.description: The product UUID or the product reference

put.description:
You can't create a new brand while updating a product. Set the desired brand UUID or reference in the brand_id field otherwise the default brand will be used.
Please also note that the image processing might happen asynchronously, so the picture_url returned by this call might still contain the default or previous picture

parameters.name: identifier
parameters.description: The product UUID or the product reference

delete.description: The product should not have any linked order's items

parameters.description: The product UUID or the product reference

400.description: The product can't be destroyed (see returned errors)

parameters.description: The product UUID or the product reference

400.description: The product's image can't be destroyed (see returned errors)

post.description: The returned item must reference an item of the order

200.description: The returned item has been deleted

get.description: One quote per mode is created

locale.name: locale
locale.description: ISO 639 (alpha-2) of the desired locale of the response

Token.description:
For accessing the API a valid token must be passed in all protected queries in
the 'Authorization' header.|
Your token is auto-generated and available on the ShopRunBack Retailer Dashboard.|
The following syntax must be used in the 'Authorization' header :

    Token token=xxxxxx
    
  or the more traditional
  
    Bearer xxxxxx
Token.name: Authorization

locale.description:
Locale of the customer (format: ISO 639-1).
This is the locale the application will use to send emails to the customer. If the customer goes to the online return process and its locale is changed (by the browser or by himself/herself) the locale is updated accordingly.

label.description: Label of the item (you can set the label of the product in the customer language)

barcode.description: If set, this barcode is printed next to the corresponding item in the return voucher. The barcode printed is a CODE 128

rma.description: Return merchandise authorization. If set, a barcode of the RMA is printed at the top of the return voucher

weight_in_grams.description: Weight (in grams) defined by the retailer

computed_weight_in_grams.description: Sum of the returned items weight plus a wrapping factor (used for the label generation if no weight provided by the retailer)

public_url.description: URL you can provide to your customer or redirect to

charged.description: Boolean set to true if shipback has been completed

size.description: See the jigsizes endpoint for valid values and the corresponding dimensions

quotes.description: One quote for each available modes (pickup, dropoff, postal), the quote is refreshed asynchronously after the shipback creation. Poll the shipback few seconds after its creation to get the different quotes (computed) and their prices or wait for the webhook

price.description: Price of the return for this mode in euros cent

shipback_id.description: Shipback UUID if a shipback exists for this order

percentage.description: The part of the return price you want to pay

merchant_fee_min.description: The part (in euro) you want to pay (at least)

merchant_fee_max.description: The part (in euro) you want to pay (maximum)

customer_fee_min.description: The part (in euro) you customer will have to pay (at least)

customer_fee_max.description: The part (in euro) you customer will have to pay (maximum)

brand_id.description:
[writeOnly] Product brand UUID or reference
if not provided the default company brand will be used.
You can create the brand with the product by providing the brand object instead of the brand_id.

picture_file_base64.description: [writeOnly] Product image base64 encoded (not present in response)

picture_file_url.description: [writeOnly] Your own picture URL (not present in response)

default.description: Is this the default company brand ? (only 1 per company)

label.description: Label of the wish in the defined locale

description.description: Description of the wish in the defined locale

label.description: Label of the reason in the defined locale

description.description: Description of the reason in the defined locale
description.example: The product doesn't fit (smaller or larger than expected)

name.description: Name of the country in the desired locale (default EN)

created_at.description: Date of creation of the account

pending.description: Does the collaborator invitation is pending

manager.description: Does the collaborator has manager's rights

auth_token.description: Auth Token (displayed only for the requester account)
An authentication token to emit API calls on behalf of the company. Only available to company owners.

reference.description: Your unique reference (if set, should be unique)

state.description: State of the quote, created > computing > computed ( > selected)

available.description: set if quote is computed. False if this mode is impossible, True otherwise

dropoff_points.description: Dropoff points (if mode is dropoff). Not returned on the index endpoint

pickup_slots.description: Pickup slots (if mode is pickup). Not returned on the index endpoint

distance.description: Distance (in meters) from the customer address

id.description: ID of the point (defined by the carrier)

duration.description: Duration of the slot in minutes

availability.description: Limit of the slot (number of coursier), -1 if unlimited

resent_at.description: Date when email is sent manually through /trigger
